EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_LA Open House_Q415.Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: Exclusive Invitation: Pivotal Los Angeles Open House - November 10
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Pivotal is delighted to invite you to the Los Angeles Open House in our newly renovated office space. REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/open-house/la?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=LA-Open-House-11-10-15> Join us for a special evening, The Art of Transformation, as we announce our partnership with CoreLogic to create the Pivotal/CoreLogic Innovation Labs and celebrate the thriving LA art and design community. Come meet and mingle with our CEO Rob Mee, senior executives from Pivotal and CoreLogic and enjoy drinks, hors dâ€™oeuvres and interactive entertainment while networking with the community. Space is limited so register today.
We look forward to you joining us.
Should you have any questions or would like more information about this event, please email us. Kindly RSVP <http://pivotal.io/event/open-house/la?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=LA-Open-House-11-10-15>> as space is limited for this special event.
